description: Updates the value of the enhanced security monitoring setting for new workspaces.

account_id.description: Databricks account ID of the account being managed.

allow_missing.description: This should always be set to true for Settings API. Added for AIP compliance.

etag.description: with the PATCH request to identify the setting version you are updating.

setting_name.description: respected instead. Setting name is required to be 'default' if the setting only has one instance per workspace.

field_mask.description: use comma as the separator (no space).

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

403.description: Caller does not have permission to execute the specified operation.

404.description: Operation was performed on a resource that does not exist.

409.description: Request was rejected due a conflict with an existing resource.
